name: AIR Controller Tester
body:
### Welcome to AIR Controller Tester

This is still 100% a work in progress.

## Download

[Download v0.1.0 of the Controller Input Tester](https://github.com/downloads/brettchalupa/AIR-Controller-Tester/AIRControllerTester-v0.1.0.zip)

## Features

* Hot-swap controllers
* Supports up to 16 controllers

## TODO

* Make it not run like ass

## Thanks
tagline: A tester for testing controllers with AIR!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
